EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E
ISO_TRIANGLE C A B
FOOT D C A B
FOOT E D B C
SHOW: EQANGLE A C C D B D D E
A(171.000000000000000-3,383.000000000000000+5)  B(511.000000000000000+0,383.000000000000000+3)  C(341.000000000000000+7,216.000000000000000-24)  D(341.000000000000000+1,383.000000000000000+1)  E(424.486766803430200+7,298.013470918663800-24)
